userStories.title: Verification harness setup
userStories.description: Set up canonical install/lint/typecheck/test/build commands and document in AGENTS.md. Add verify script to package.json.
acceptanceCriteria: package.json has 'verify' script that runs lint + typecheck + build
userStories.notes: Lint + typecheck pass. Build requires network (Google Fonts). Fixed lint errors in werken-bij, about-teaser, procurement, over-ons, hero.

userStories.title: Data layer + migrations + seed demo data
userStories.description: Set up Supabase schema with migrations for core entities. Create seed script with demo data for tenders, leads, jobs, and cases.
acceptanceCriteria: Supabase migration files exist in supabase/migrations/
Core tables defined: users, leads, tenders, jobs, cases, compliance_docs
Seed data includes 5+ tenders, 8+ leads, 3+ jobs, 6+ cases
userStories.notes: 6 SQL migrations, TypeScript types, JSON seed data (6 tenders, 10 leads, 4 jobs, 8 cases, 8 compliance docs). Supabase CLI required for migrations.

userStories.title: Auth + RBAC skeleton + /admin protect
userStories.description: Implement authentication flow with Supabase Auth. Create RBAC system with roles (DIRECTIE, SALES, HR, OPERATIONS, ADMIN). Protect all /admin routes.
acceptanceCriteria: Login page at /login works with Supabase Auth
User roles stored in profiles table
userStories.notes: Implemented magic link auth, middleware protection, RBAC utilities with role hierarchy. Security review completed.

userStories.title: Uploads & media asset handling
userStories.description: Implement file upload handling with size/type limits. Use Supabase Storage for files.
userStories.notes: Implemented storage utilities with file validation, upload to Supabase Storage, and media_assets table for tracking.

userStories.title: Audit log basis
userStories.description: Create audit log system for tracking login events and CRUD operations on critical entities.
acceptanceCriteria: Create/Update/Delete on leads, tenders, jobs logged
Log includes: user_id, action, entity, entity_id, timestamp, metadata
Audit log viewable in admin (later story)
userStories.notes: Implemented DB triggers for automatic logging on all core tables. Helper functions in lib/audit.ts.

userStories.title: SEO baseline
userStories.description: Implement SEO foundation: metadata, sitemap.xml, robots.txt, OpenGraph tags for all pages.
acceptanceCriteria: Each page has unique title and description
userStories.notes: Created sitemap.ts and robots.ts. Added route-specific layouts with metadata for all marketing pages.

userStories.title: Diensten structure alignment
userStories.description: Align diensten pages with 'Bouw & Renovatie' and 'Facility' structure. Add clear CTAs leading to intake flows.
acceptanceCriteria: Each service page has CTA to projectplanner
userStories.notes: Created bouw-renovatie (nieuwbouw, renovatie, erfgoed) and facility (raamcontracten, onderhoud, interventies) sub-pages with scope sections.

userStories.title: Cases CMS model + listing + detail + filters
userStories.description: Create cases/referenties system with CMS-ready model, listing page with filters, and detail pages.
acceptanceCriteria: Case study data model defined (title, client, scope, location, year, photos, KPIs)
Filter by sector (publiek, onderwijs, zorg, industrie)
Cases data from Sanity or JSON seed
userStories.notes: Already implemented with filterable listing, sector filters, detail pages with KPIs. Data from FEATURED_PROJECTS.

userStories.title: Procurement hub: Tender Pack request flow
userStories.description: Enhance procurement hub with Tender Pack request flow and downloadable documents section.
acceptanceCriteria: Form captures: name, org, email, purpose (aanbesteding/preselectie/raamcontract)
userStories.notes: Created documentatie page with form, /api/leads endpoint, and documents list.

userStories.title: Jobs: job detail + apply flow + JobPosting schema
userStories.description: Create job detail pages with apply flow and Google JobPosting structured data.
acceptanceCriteria: JobPosting JSON-LD schema on detail page
Apply form with CV upload + GDPR consent
Confirmation email mention (stub if no SMTP)
userStories.notes: Created job detail pages with JobPosting JSON-LD schema. Apply form with CV upload (10MB limit) and GDPR consent. Confirmation message shown after submit, email noted as stub.

userStories.title: Contact flow → lead record
userStories.description: Convert contact form to proper lead intake flow. No email-only submissions.
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form creates lead record in database
Lead type set based on form selection
userStories.notes: Updated contact form to create lead records. Added organisation field. Lead type mapped from contact subject (raamcontract→procurement, offerte→project, etc.). Zod validation with full CONTACT_SUBJECTS alignment.

userStories.title: Cockpit v1: tiles + alerts + export
userStories.description: Create directie cockpit with KPI tiles, alerts widget, and board pack export.
acceptanceCriteria: Tender pipeline tile with counts per stage
Lead pipeline tile per service type
Export button for board pack (CSV/PDF stub)
userStories.notes: Created directie cockpit with KPI tiles, tender/lead pipeline bars, expiry radar (30/60/90), alerts for new leads/analyzing tenders/expiring docs, and board pack export stub.

userStories.title: Lead hub v1: pipeline + assignment + reminders
userStories.description: Create lead management hub with pipeline view, assignment, and follow-up reminders.
acceptanceCriteria: Pipeline view with stages (new, contacted, qualified, proposal, won, lost)
userStories.notes: Created lead hub with pipeline and list views. Detail modal with contact info, assignment dropdown, notes, and next action date. Actions logged to console.

userStories.title: Tender hub v1: TED RSS ingest + opportunity list
userStories.description: Create tender hub with TED RSS feed ingestion and normalized opportunity list.
acceptanceCriteria: List shows: title, buyer, deadline, status, match score
Filter by CPV code and status
userStories.notes: Created tender hub with full list view, status filters, deadline indicators, match scores. TED RSS parser in lib/tender/ted-rss.ts with CPV matching for construction trades.

userStories.title: Tender go/no-go + checklist + decision log
userStories.description: Add go/no-go workflow to tender hub with checklist and decision logging.
acceptanceCriteria: Tender detail page with go/no-go section
Checklist items: capacity, risk, margin, planning, references
Each item can be checked + notes added
Decision logged with user and timestamp

userStories.title: Compliance vault: document types + expiry radar + tender pack templates
userStories.description: Create compliance document management with expiry tracking and tender pack generation.
acceptanceCriteria: Document types: ISO, VCA, CO₂, insurance, etc.
Each doc has: name, type, issuer, valid_from, valid_to, file, scope
Expiry radar: list docs expiring in 30/60/90 days
Tender pack template: select docs to include in export

userStories.title: Recruitment hub v1: jobs CRUD + applications queue + retention
userStories.description: Create recruitment hub for managing vacancies and applications.
acceptanceCriteria: Applications list with status (new, screening, interview, offer, hired, rejected)

userStories.title: VDAB adapter stub + mapping
userStories.description: Create adapter interface for VDAB Vacature Posting API with field mapping.
acceptanceCriteria: Job to VDAB format mapping function
Publish to VDAB button (logs only, no actual API call)
userStories.notes: BLOCK: No VDAB credentials. Create stub that logs what would be sent.

userStories.title: Facility desk v1: tickets + SLA due + statuses
userStories.description: Create facility desk for managing intervention tickets with SLA tracking.
acceptanceCriteria: Ticket fields: urgency, location, description, photos, status, sla_due_at
Status workflow: open → in progress → waiting → resolved

userStories.title: Partner prequal v1: intake + doc checklist + review workflow
userStories.description: Create partner portal for prequalification with document checklist.

userStories.title: Analytics dashboard v1: events → KPI tiles
userStories.description: Create analytics dashboard showing KPI tiles from tracked events.
